title: Product
description:
@experimental context type representing a tradable product. To be used with OMS and EMS systems.

This type is currently only loosely defined as an extensible context object, with an optional instrument field.

id.title: Product Identifiers
id.description: One or more identifiers that refer to the product. Specific key names for systems are expected to be standardized in future.

name.title: Name
name.description: A human-readable summary of the product.
